A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie single handedly marred the franchise\, one of the most beloved franchises in cinematic history. Not only were pointless and random characters introduced\, existing ones made little to no progression throughout the movie\, and if anything regressed in terms of development. The sheer ridiculousness of Rian's Vision made the movie frustrating to the point of unenjoyability. He should not be allowed to participate in the making of any more franchise films for the foreseeable future.
